title: Oshkosh acquires core technology developed by Canvas
description:
Canvas creates worker-controlled drywall finishing robots that provide consistent wall finishes faster than human workers.

The post Oshkosh acquires core technology developed by Canvas appeared first on The Robot Report.
content:
